message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice.  Remember, time is money!
I understand time is money, Bob, but so is fairness. This offer is better for you in the long run.
Alice, let's be realistic.  We both lose out if this drags on. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.
Bob, my offer is getting less generous. Time is running out for you. Let's close this deal.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but this has to be a deal we can both live with. This is my final offer.
